review_blob: bottle 500ml. Typical belgian aroma, a lot of spicy aroma with cloves, and a bit of fruits from hops. slightly bitter and carbonation. Looks cloudy, small head.
It was my first American IPA. Great citrus and tropical fruits aroma. Good white head. In taste a little bit of caramel and strong, grapefruit bitter finish. Very good beer
A lot of smoked malts in aroma and taste. Foam head going down quickly laseing not exist. Beer is good, but not for me.
